snippet: The Redskins are hoping that Robert Griffin III will return against the Vikings — and take fewer chances while running.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Washington Redskins are hoping that rookie quarterback Robert Griffin III will return quickly after sustaining his first NFL concussion, and take fewer chances while running; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Redskins are hoping that Robert Griffin III will return against the Vikings — and take fewer chances while running.
